content.p:
ยง 726. Ogdensburg bridge and port authority. Notwithstanding any other
provisions of this chapter, the members of the Ogdensburg bridge
authority in office on the effective date of this title shall become and
be the members of the board of and shall thereafter constitute, the
Ogdensburg bridge and port authority, and shall hold office for the
balance of the terms for which they were severally appointed.
 All of the provisions of title eight of article three of this chapter,
respecting the qualifications, appointment, terms, officers, number of
members and removal of members of the Ogdensburg bridge authority,
including the filling of vacancies occurring for any reason, shall
hereafter be applicable to the members of the Ogdensburg bridge and port
authority, except that all members shall hereafter be appointed by and
with the advice and consent of the senate.
